![Tetrarkh] of Fairy- refugees To [noeti] [Mimirid]: I [Tetrarkh] of fairies, but at the point of me it was necessary to throw her tribesmen and to run here. Do not ask according to this more, to me and so it is very shameful. (This Quest is accessible after reaching of the 90th level and fulfillment of Quests " Shadow Of [bespokoystva]" , " Soundless Of [slukhi]")
